Title: Permits the use of plastic bags until January 1, 2021
Summary: Permits the use of plastic bags until January 1, 2021 and suspends any rule or regulation concerning bag waste reduction currently in effect until January 1, 2021 in response to the public health emergency related to the coronavirus (COVID-19).
LawCode: Amd Part H ยง5, Chap 58 of 2019
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part H of chapter 58 of the laws of 2019, amending the environmental conservation law and other laws relating to establishing guidelines for bag waste reduction, in relation to the effectiveness thereof; and suspends any rule or regulation concerning such bag waste reduction currently in effect until January 1, 2021 in response to the public health emergency related to the coronavirus (COVID-19)
